verses.esv: 25 But the word that is written in their Law must be fulfilled: ‘They hated me without a cause.’
verses.kjv: 25 But this cometh to pass, that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law, They hated me without a cause.
verses.niv: 25 But this is to fulfill what is written in their Law: 'They hated me without reason.'

verses.esv:
16   There are six things that the LORD hates,
    seven that are an abomination to him:
verses.kjv: 16 These six things doth the LORD hate: yea, seven are an abomination unto him:
verses.niv: 16 There are six things the LORD hates, seven that are detestable to him:
